item.title: MTA Smart Metrocard
item.description: background The NYC metro system has remained unchanged for decades. Users of NYC subway sometimes have uncomfortable experiences; the lost time of waiting in line to buy a metrocard, touching a dirty machine, dirty platform and so on. The following chart (source) shows that Ridership through ride-sharing services like Uber and Lyft has increased, while subway and bus ridership has declined. App-based services are based on a great UX and are increasing their users dramatically.

item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: Background After the deregulation, which direction should the electric power company aim for? In 2016, full-scale deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies have entered the electricity market. Chubu Electric Power Company (C-EPCO), one of Japanese electricity utility providers, must shift to a new paradigm of customer service in order to improve its retention capability. Problem How might we create tight family bonds in recent Japanese families?

item.title: UBER UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN
item.description: Project Overview After a class call with Sam Eldersveld, Director of Operations Research at Uber, we learned that, Uber thinks the perfect pickup is the most important factor of the User Experience. The moment of pickup is when the driver and the rider meet for the first time. Both drivers and riders are nervous and frustrating in this moment because drivers want to finish the work without trouble and riders want to get to the destination quickly.

item.title: IBM WATSON COGNITIVE ENTERPRISE APP
item.description: Overview IBM Watson cognitive application We delivered an initial phase of a cognitive Watson Advisor solution using agile engineering approach. MHI engineers can inspect and take action for risks of their projects in advance without long industry experience. They reduced the time taken by the worker’s task by 30% as a result. item.title: Future Supermarket 2020
item.description: Overview Demo Video As a facilitator of design thinking, our team designed a 2-days intensive design workshop and created a concept of supermarket of the next-generation. Our concept is that customers and their families can turn their household worries into fun and create their sustainable local communities together. In the last activity, we defined next To-Dos and achieved a consensus beyond all departments of Inageya. Finally, the client could go forward to a next step.
